Title: Increases from $300 to $600 the monthly rent subsidy payable for housing for a foster child living independently in certain circumstances
Summary: Increases from $300 to $600 the monthly rent subsidy payable for housing for a foster child living independently in certain circumstances; doesn't limit those from living with roommates.
LawCode: Amd ยง409-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to increasing from $300 a month to $600 a month the rent subsidy payable to a foster child living independently
